Name: Active Mummy
About the game: Active Mummy is a side-scrolling platformer with addicting gameplay. You control a mummy who must collect all the diamonds. An unusual hero can move along ceilings and climb walls, but no matter how there is the force of gravity, it will play its role. Scattered mines, sharp bayonets on the levels will not make you bored and will test your nerves for strength. After all the diamonds are collected, a portal will open that will take you to a new level. Each new level is even more difficult, and the traps are set so that to test you! Game features: - Old school gameplay - Pixel art graphics
